ygData.subject: Re: enchanter spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Enchantment of Light/Brilliance are not in the game yet. Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server) Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to
ygData.messageBody:
Enchantment of Light/Brilliance are not in the game yet.

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/
